forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 30 overnight. East southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 10am, then freezing rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms between 10am and 11am, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and rain and snow between 11am and 3pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow between 3pm and 4pm. Cloudy, with a high near 35. East wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North wind around 6 mph. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. East wind 2 to 6 mph.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's Run still has complete coverage! But you'll have to walk a bit to get to it: the clubhouse is closed as is the clubhouse parking lot. Classic tracks are very hard pack or ice but still deep enough to stay on the track. The skating lane is hard pack but several people were skating without any trouble. Me? Klister. But my Rex "Oi" just wasn't working very well, probably because of the rushed job of waxing. Great day to doublepole!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track. Trails were packed on Tuesday.
nubsNob.comments:
Merry Christmas from all of us at Nub's Nob. We are open from 11:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today.
Pintail Peak Lodge is also open. Santa will be skiing on Big Time today. Everything is groomed and in great condition to enjoy Christmas on the slopes. Make it a great Christmas Day at Nub's Nob.
